metadata.dc:author: Ibañez, J C
Medica, R O
metadata.dc:description: It is work out and discuss one of the principal problems in the laser therapy use during the TMJ dysfunction treatment: the determination of the application points for the soft-laser stay, detailing the position of some of them that are essentials to obtain the objectives of this type of treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Laserterapia en las disfunciones témporo-mandibulares (puntos de aplicación del láser blando).
[Laser therapy in temporomandibular dysfunction (soft laser application points)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Facultad de Odontologia
